Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near Damen.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Wallace
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Halsted, Marquette, Stewart and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Halsted, Marquette, Stewart and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Wallace.

Allow extra travel time.
